data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Pulau Pinang hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pulau Pinang, Malaysia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 53,484 believers in the state of Pulau Pinang.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Pulau Pinang, Malaysia.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Pulau Pinang, Malaysia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Kayaman people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Pulau Pinang that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Pulau Pinang against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Pulau Pinang to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
